actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To amend the Carl D. Perkins Vocational Education Act to establish a program of grants to economically depressed areas for purposes of improving facilities and equipment needed to carry out vocational education programs under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Carl D. Perkins Vocational Education Act to establish a program of grants to local educational agencies in economically depressed areas to improve facilities and to acquire or lease equipment for vocational education programs.

titles.title: To amend the Carl D. Perkins Vocational Education Act to establish a program of grants to economically depressed areas for purposes of improving facilities and equipment needed to carry out vocational education programs under such Act.
